summary:
This mod make it so you mine gem ore instead of already cut gems while mining.
You can take the gem ore to any Gemcutting Station and turn them into raw gems,
which can be turned into cut gems at any Gemcutting Station.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Where to get the items needed.
~~~~~
Madesi in Riften, Kerah in Markarth and Fralia in Whiterun sell gems of all stages.
As well as the objects you need in order to craft the various gems.
~~~~~
The gems and crafting items can also be found in any place where you could find gems,
like dungeons ect.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version Log~~~~~
~~~~~
Version 7.1
Added small sphere cut gems.
added basic gold and silver rings for each gem.
the small sphere cut gems are used in the making of the rings.
can now make 4 silver rings with 1 silver ingot.
can now make 4 gold rings with 1 gold ingot.
Jeweler's Manuals are needed in your inventory to create jewelry.
rings with gems are now crafted at gemcutting stations.
gold rings with gems need a gold ring and a small sphere cut gem to make.
silver rings with gems need a silver ring and a small sphere cut gem to make.
~~~~~
Version 6
Geodes have a chance of giving filled soul gems.
Gem Geodes from Dragonborn now give raw gems and gem ore.
Silverware is now worth good money.
Jewelry is more expensive.
Chance to mine more then one Stalhrim chunk at a time.
Stalhrim deposits no longer give gems.
You can now make a copy of the Curious Silver Mold from the Thieves Guild Quest line.
The Curious Silver Mold, and the one you can make can be used to make Fine Silver Candlesticks.
The Gem Paragons from DawnGuard are now very expensive.
~~~~~
Version 5
Requires Skyrim, Update, Dawnguard and Dragonborn master files.
Adds a book, Chisels, Schematics and manuals,
that you need in your inventory in order to cut raw gems into the cut gems.
~~~~~
Version 4
Requires only the Skyrim master file.
The Completed Basic Version. Can mine, cut, find, and buy all of the gems.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This mod makes it so you mine gem ore instead of already cut gems while mining.
You can take the gem ore to any Gemcutting Station and turn them into raw gems,
which can be turned into cut gems at any Gemcutting Station.
~~~~~
You can also buy the gems rarely from any misc item shop,
and the jewelry shops always have gems for sale.
~~~~~
There are 6 new gems making the total amount of gems 12 now.
The gems already a part of Skyrim are,
Amethyst
Diamond
Emerald
Garnet
Ruby
Sapphire
~~~~~
The new gems are,
Aquamarine
Citrine
Jet
Topaz
Turmaline
Zircon
~~~~~
Originally in Skyrim the gems where only in one cut,
Brilliant cut Diamonds
Emerald cut Emeralds
Oval cut Rubies
Pear cut Garnets
Square cut Sapphires
Trilliant cut Amethyst
~~~~~
But now the 6 original gems, plus the 6 new gems,
all can be found and/or cut into any of the 6 different cuts.
~~~~~~~~~~

The meshes used are the original ones from Skyrim.
The Textures used are from Skyrim, but I copied and edited them.
author: General_Durandal

files.name: Mine and Cut Gems V7 Fail
